## AFAD-related activities {#AAdataset}

#### Description

Daily activities conducted around [AFADs](#afad), including catches retained and discarded.

#### Conservation and Management Measures

- Res. [23/01](https://iotc.org/cmm/resolution-2301-management-anchored-fish-aggregating-devices-afads) (para. 11 and Annex II) -- _On the management of anchored fish aggregating devices (AFADs)_

#### Contents

Geographic position and description of each fishing activity conducted around each AFAD along with estimates of retained catches and discards in numbers or live weight equivalent for the IOTC species, common sharks, and other bycatch species.
